project.description:
'bundle.tests' dynamicimport-package from 'bundle'. This test asserts that the package can be resolved when running the tests.
Although not validated by this test, dynamicimport-package is expected to work for indirect dependencies, i.e. test requires a bundle which in turn dynamicimport-package from another bundle. Likewise, dynamicimport-package is expected to work for packages exported by fragments.
I am not 100% sure if dynamicimport-package should also work for static class references, but this is not supported by neither PDE/IDE nor Tycho. For now we can assume that dynamicimport-package only concerns running the tests and does not require explicit support outside of TestMojo.
